mapper.sql: goods_id, title, sub_title, original_cost, current_price, discount, is_free_delivery, category_id, last_update_time

insert into t_goods
goods_id,
title,
sub_title,
original_cost,
current_price,
discount,
is_free_delivery,
category_id,
last_update_time,

mapper.update:
update t_goods
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_title = #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original_cost = #{originalCost,jdbcType=REAL},
current_price = #{currentPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=REAL},
is_free_delivery = #{isFreeDelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_goods set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_title = #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_cost = #{originalCost,jdbcType=REAL}, current_price = #{currentPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=REAL}, is_free_delivery = #{isFreeDelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_goods where last_update_time >=now()-interval 5 minute
